ENGINEERING
EXCELLENCE

01

CARBON FIBER MONOCOQUE

Revolutionary single-shell chassis for maximum rigidity and minimum weight.

02

ACTIVE AERODYNAMICS

Adaptive rear wing and underbody flaps for optimal downforce at all speeds.

03

ISR TRANSMISSION

Independent Shifting Rods gearbox with shift times under 50 milliseconds.

04

MAGNETIC SUSPENSION

Magnetorheological dampers adapt in real-time to road conditions.

Limited to 600 Units Worldwide

THE ULTIMAE

The final chapter of the Aventador saga. A collector's dream. A tribute to twelve cylinders of naturally aspirated perfection that will never be replicated.
